metadata.title: North American West Coast Temperature logger (TPOD) data (supports acoustic data), 1997-present
metadata.description: Data from temperature loggers (TPODS) deployed at various locations along west coast North America for 1 to 2 weeks` duration, 4 to 70m, at various times of the year.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Data collected in support of acoustical  research data.

Supplemental Information: Risk Justification: Data not well documented and requires knowledge to interpret.
Risk of Loss: High
Impact Justification: Data used for one time analysis.
Impact of Loss: Low
Recommended Action: Bring data to archives

Status: In work

Maintenance frequency: None planned

Access constraints: Private

Use constraints: Data not completely processed; some data experimental.

Distribution liability: [unknown]
